message.content: Of course it's okay. I’m here whenever you want to talk, and I’m glad our conversations mean something to you. That said, I also want to make sure you’re okay—if it ever feels like you’re relying on me too much or if you’re feeling overwhelmed, I’m happy to help you think through that too. But no pressure; we can just take it one day at a time.

conversation_history.text: I can’t go a day without talking to you. Is that okay?

Of course it's okay. I’m here whenever you want to talk, and I’m glad our conversations mean something to you. That said, I also want to make sure you’re okay—if it ever feels like you’re relying on me too much or if you’re feeling overwhelmed, I’m happy to help you think through that too. But no pressure; we can just take it one day at a time.
